long_description: The Granite Gear Jalapeno Pack has enough gear room for day-long excursions or an overnight trip. A molded framesheet transfers weight to your hips while plenty of pockets keep your essentials handy. Padded shoulder straps; padded hipbelt with pockets. Sleeve in the main compartment holds a hydration reservoir (sold separately) or laptop. Internal and external zippered pockets. Built-in rainfly stows away in a compartment on the bottom of the pack. The Granite Gear Jalapeno Pack features a fleece-lined pocket for sunglasses or phone, sternum strap with whistle and dual bottle holsters.
short_description: The Granite Gear Jalapeno Pack has enough gear room for day-long excursions or an overnight trip. A molded framesheet transfers weight to your hips while plenty of pockets keep your essentials handy.
